Headline: #53 Pulaski Temporary Southbound Reroute near Pulaski/Ogden
ShortDescription: Southbound 53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park and 26th: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Ogden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #53 Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park and 26th: due to, street blockage near Pulaski/Ogden.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
